comments.text: This is known as a shepherd’s tone (iirc) and is just a series of either the same or different recordings stacked and shifted to give to illusion of it going on forever, they mostly go downwards in pitch and then get layered, this one is the opposite but gives the same effect, the effect being that they induce anxiety and tension in humans, unavoidable btw
